Address.Address1: 2 Avenue Mohmed V, Angle Boulevard Abdelkrim Elkhatabi et Rue Ibn Aicha

Description.Text: Hotel les Ambassadeurs is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Marrakech. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, a spa and a good location close to several restaurants. Gueliz is a modern district situated close to the old Medina. It offers many fashionable restaurants and boutiques. Nearby places of interest include the Koutoubia Mosque, Majorelle Gardens and the historic centre, where travellers can explore the lively souks and many architectural landmarks. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Marrakech destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with traditional Moroccan features and balconies. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, a spa and steam room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a traditional style with wood furniture, pastel tones and tiled floors. They feature a balcony with a city view. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The hotel restaurant serves Moroccan specialities and international cuisine in a relaxed setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
